00032 autojet::autojet( QWidget *parent, Qt::WFlags flags ) :
00033                 QMainWindow( parent, flags )
00034 {
00035         ui.setupUi( this );
00036         
00037         logFile = new QFile( QDir::home().absolutePath()+"/"+AUTOJET_LOG );
00038         logFile->open( QIODevice::WriteOnly | QIODevice::Append );
00039 
00040         //Fullscreen
00041         //setWindowState( Qt::WindowFullScreen );
00042 
00043         connect( ui.actionQuit, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00044                 this, SLOT( close() ) );
00045 
00046         connect( ui.actionShut_Down, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00047                 this, SLOT( halt() ) );
00048 
00049         settings = new QSettings( "ematech", "autojet" );
00050 
00051         settings->beginGroup( "general" );
00052         imagedir = settings->value("imagedir", "/" ).toString();
00053         ui.notes->setPlainText( settings->value( "notes", tr("Notes") ).toString() );
00054         settings->endGroup();
00055 
00056         configDialog = new Configuration( settings, this );
00057         connect( configDialog, SIGNAL( finished() ), this, SLOT( buildView() ) );
00058         
00059         createDialog = new Create( this );
00060         connect( createDialog, SIGNAL( finished() ), this, SLOT( buildView() ) );
00061 
00062         connect( ui.actionConfigure, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00063                  this, SLOT( showConfig() ) );
00064 
00065         connect( ui.actionEject, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00066                  this, SLOT( eject() ) );
00067         connect( ui.actionCreate_Image, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00068                  this, SLOT( create() ) );
00069         connect( ui.actionBlank, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00070                  this, SLOT( blank() ) );
00071         connect( ui.actionSet_Image, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00072                  this, SLOT( imagefile() ) );
00073         connect( ui.actionBurn, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00074                  this, SLOT( burn() ) );
00075         connect( ui.actionHelp, SIGNAL( activated() ),
00076                  this, SLOT( help() ) );
00077         connect( ui.notes, SIGNAL( textChanged() ),
00078                  this, SLOT( saveNotes() ) );
00079         buildView();
00080 }

00092 void autojet::buildView( void )
00093 {
00094         // Cleanup burnersList
00095         burnersList.clear();
00096         
00097         // Retrieve number of burners from settings
00098         settings->beginGroup( "general" );
00099         int numBurners = settings->value( "numburners", 0 ).toInt();
00100         settings->endGroup();
00101 
00102         // Create CDWriter objects and populate GUI
00103         for( int i = 1; i <= numBurners; i++ )
00104         {
00105                 CDWriter *cur = new CDWriter( this, settings, i );
00106                 burnersList.append( cur );
00107                 ui.burnersLayout->addWidget( cur );
00108 
00109                 connect( cur, SIGNAL( clicked() ), this, SLOT( changeView() ) );
00110         }
00111 
00112         // Maximizes the first burner in the list
00113         if ( burnersList.size() > 0 )
00114         {
00115                 burnersList.at( 0 )->maximize();
00116         }
00117         maximized = 0;
00118 }
00119 
00120 void autojet::changeView( void )
00121 {
00122         CDWriter *obj = (CDWriter*) sender();
00123         
00124         for (int i = 0; i < burnersList.size(); ++i)
00125         {
00126                 if ( obj == burnersList.at( i ) )
00127                 {
00128                         burnersList.at( i )->maximize();
00129                         maximized = i ;
00130                 } else
00131                 {
00132                         burnersList.at( i )->minimize();
00133                 }
00134         }
00135 }

00157 void autojet::eject( void )
00158 {
00159         int i = 0;
00160         while( i < burnersList.count() )
00161         {
00162                 if ( burnersList.at(i)->isIdle() ) burnersList.at(i)->eject();
00163                 i++;
00164         }
00165 }
00166 
00167 void autojet::create( void )
00168 {
00169 
00170  for (int i = 0; i < burnersList.size(); ++i)
00171         {
00172                 if ( !burnersList.at( i )->isIdle() )
00173                 {
00174                         QMessageBox::warning( this, tr("Please wait..."),
00175                                                         tr("All CD Writers must be idle.\n"
00176                                                         "Please wait for them to settle down.") );
00177                         return;
00178                 }
00179         }
00180 
00181         createDialog->show();
00182 }
00183 
00184 void autojet::blank( void )
00185 {
00186         int i = 0;
00187         while( i < burnersList.count() )
00188         {
00189                 if ( burnersList.at(i)->isIdle() ) burnersList.at(i)->blank();
00190                 i++;
00191         }
00192 }
00193 
00194 void autojet::burn( void )
00195 {
00196         int i = 0;
00197         while( i < burnersList.count() )
00198         {
00199                 if ( burnersList.at(i)->isIdle() ) burnersList.at(i)->burn();
00200                 i++;
00201         }
00202 }

00204 void autojet::imagefile( void )
00205 {
00206         QString isoFilter = tr( "ISO Images (*.iso)" );
00207         QString cueFilter = tr( "Cue Sheets (*.cue *.toc)");
00208         QString *outFilter = new QString();
00209         QString file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
00210                         tr("Select Image to burn"),
00211                         imagedir, isoFilter + "\n" + cueFilter, 0 );
00212         if ( file.isNull() )
00213         {
00214                 return;
00215         }
00216         int i = 0;
00217         while( i < burnersList.count() )
00218         {
00219                 if ( burnersList.at(i)->isIdle() )
00220                 {
00221                         if ( *outFilter == cueFilter )
00222                                 cuefile = true;
00223                         else
00224                                 cuefile = false;
00225 
00226                         burnersList.at(i)->imagefile( file );
00227                 }
00228                 i++;
00229         }
00230 }

00232 void autojet::addLog( QString in )
00233 {
00234         logFile->write( in.toUtf8() );
00235         logFile->flush();
00236 }
00237 
00238 void autojet::keyReleaseEvent ( QKeyEvent * event )
00239 {
00240         if ( ui.notes->hasFocus() )
00241         {
00242                 return;
00243         }
00244         
00245         switch( event->key() )
00246         {
00247                 case Qt::Key_Down:
00248                         maximized++;
00249                         break;
00250                 case Qt::Key_Up:
00251                         maximized--;
00252                         break;
00253                 case Qt::Key_0:
00254                         maximized = 9;
00255                         break;
00256                 default:
00257                 {
00258                         if ( event->key() > Qt::Key_0 && event->key() <= Qt::Key_9 )
00259                         {
00260                                 maximized = event->key() - Qt::Key_1;
00261                         }
00262                 }
00263         }
00264 
00265         if ( maximized >= burnersList.size() )
00266         {
00267                 maximized = 0;
00268         }
00269 
00270         if ( maximized < 0 )
00271         {
00272                 maximized = burnersList.size() - 1;
00273         }
00274 
00275         for (int i = 0; i < burnersList.size(); ++i)
00276         {
00277                 if ( maximized == i )
00278                 {
00279                         burnersList.at( i )->maximize();
00280                 } else
00281                 {
00282                         burnersList.at( i )->minimize();
00283                 }
00284         }
00285 }
00286 
00287 void autojet::saveNotes( void )
00288 {
00289         settings->beginGroup( "general" );
00290         settings->setValue( "notes", ui.notes->toPlainText() );
00291         settings->endGroup();
00292 }
